bibl.title: A Catalogue of Tables.
bibl.note: Completion of a preliminary list in: ZPE 53 (1983) pp. 263-264, abstracted and abbreviated from "The Mathematics of Plato's Academy. A New Reconstruction" (Oxford, 1987). Contains all the published examples of arithmetical tables in Egyptian, Coptic, and Greek. Division Tables. - Addition and Multiplication Tables. - Tables of Squares.
bibl.seg: Fowler David H., A Catalogue of Tables.

Completion of a preliminary list in: ZPE 53 (1983) pp. 263-264, abstracted and abbreviated from "The Mathematics of Plato's Academy. A New Reconstruction" (Oxford, 1987).
